text.text_translated:
Chloe has two pet rats. Their names are Zena and Roxy.
Chloe knows they are not normal pets. She tried many times to tell people. She said rats are not dirty. She said they are good pets. You must look after them well.
But she knows why people feel bad about rats. Chloe did not like rats before. Her friend Martin had pet rats. He showed them to Chloe. Chloe saw they were friendly. She saw they were clever.
Last year, Martin's rat had babies. Chloe wanted two of the babies.
